name: Lifeform
description:
Based off of one of my favourite films, 'Alien', I bring you 'Lifeform'.

You play as David Marshall, a patrol vessel with a mission to retrieve a drifting capsule containing valuable research. But when the contents of the capsule breaks free, it's a fight for survival until he reaches Earth.

Use the buttons on the side of the door to stop the mysterious life form from reaching the cockpit. But be warned, the doors have a nasty habit from time to time, so you best reboot them from you console. 

CONTROLS

Move the mouse to the left or right side of the screen to look down corridors. Move back to the centre to move  back to the cockpit. Use mouse to click and hold buttons, hover over white arrow at the top of the screen to bring up your terminal.

The zones where the mouse changes the view can be adjusted in the options menu.
